definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
Bijie city and prefecture in Guizhou
original identity fully revealed (idiom); fig. to unmask and expose the whole truth

sentences.english: "Completion date issue date, date date high-ching" is the performance criteria.
sentences.chinese: “日事日畢，日清日高”是績效準則。

sentences.english: I have read the above and agree to adhere to the guidelines as outlined.
sentences.chinese: 我已閱畢以上資料，並同意遵守之。

sentences.english: Bigelow was only the fourth female ever to be nominated for Best Director.
sentences.chinese: 畢格羅是有史以來第四位獲得最佳導演提名的女性。

sentences.english: The student finishes singing the Rwandan national anthem, and takes in the applause.
sentences.chinese: 學生們唱畢盧旺達國歌，教室裏響起熱烈地掌聲。

sentences.english: The Bigelow astronauts would intervene only if any problems arise.
sentences.chinese: 如果出現問題，畢格羅宇航員會人工進行調正。

sentences.english: Be considerate; please vacate your seat once you have finished using.
sentences.chinese: 推己及人，於用畢後，請立即騰空座位。

sentences.english: Most of the V is formed by an open cluster of stars, called the Hyades.
sentences.chinese: 這個V字型大致是由一串星星組成的，它們叫畢星雲。

sentences.english: I flunked the exam again . I'll never graduate .
sentences.chinese: 我考試又沒通過，看來畢不了業了。

sentences.english: Min. undergraduate degree from university or accredited college in related area of study.
sentences.chinese: 國內外大學以上商學院相關科系畢。

sentences.english: I have read all the regulations in the handbook and commit to obey the rules enumerated in said handbook.
sentences.chinese: 本人已閱畢簡章條文，並遵守所有簡章上相關之規定。

sentences.english: His space stations are not his only interest in space.
sentences.chinese: 畢格羅對於太空的興趣不僅僅集中在空間站上。

sentences.english: I've never wanted to think about the end, and then it was suddenly there.
sentences.chinese: 我從沒想要斟酌過已畢，而它就忽然離開你眼前。

sentences.english: I have read all the regulations in the handbook and commit to obey the rules enumerated in the handbook.
sentences.chinese: 本人已閱畢簡章條文，並遵守所有簡章上相關之規定。

sentences.english: If you're a guy, you will not graduate.
sentences.chinese: 如果你是男生，你就畢不了業。

sentences.english: Chinese man called Mr Bi has trained his cat to use his toilet.
sentences.chinese: 中國的畢先生訓練的愛貓便便發明貓咪專用的衝廁器。

sentences.english: I'm out of order. Peh , you're out of order. This whole courtroom's out of order.
sentences.chinese: 我是不正常，畢，你也不對勁，整個法庭都出毛病了。

definition: the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
to think (i.e. to take it to be true that ...) (Usually there is an implication that the notion is mistaken – except when expressing one's own current opinion.)
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to read a book/to study/to attend school
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
